duties_responsibilities.duty: Originate mortgage loans by evaluating and approving applications from prospective borrowers.
Provide guidance and support to borrowers throughout the loan process, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience.
Analyze financial information, credit reports, and property evaluations to determine loan feasibility and risk.
Maintain knowledge of mortgage products, rates, and guidelines to advise clients on the best financing options.
Build and maintain relationships with real estate agents, builders, and other referral sources to generate leads and business opportunities.
Ensure compliance with lending regulations, policies, and procedures to protect the interests of the company and its clients.
